Regulation Name(s): Device to detect and measure non-microbial analyte(s) in human clinical specimens to aid in assessment of patients with suspected sepsis
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VIDAS® B·R·A·H·M·S PCT assay using ELFA technology for automated measurement of procalcitonin in serum or plasma to aid in sepsis risk assessment.
Indications for Use Summary: Automated test for determination of procalcitonin in serum or plasma (lithium heparinate) to aid risk assessment of critically ill patients at ICU admission for progression to severe sepsis or septic shock, and for assessing 28-day mortality risk in severe sepsis or septic shock.
